Issue.summary: endorser proposal ACL needs to be configurable
Issue.description: 50% admins would not work for most situations (unlike the committer side VSCC validations). Its more reasonable to say "is this creator issuing proposal an admin" as opposed to "are there >50% admins signing off on this proposal". In any case this needs to be revisited. Till then propose we revert checkACL to allow proposals through. >
